fieldUpdates.formula:
"Welcome to Paychex HR Online" &BR()&BR()&BR()& "I am looking forward to assisting you in your utilization of the HR Online application. Per our earlier conversation, you are registered to attend our live web-based New Client Training. The session lasts approximately one hour and will give you an introductory overview of the main features of the application. You will receive a separate confirmation and instruction e-mail for your live training session, along with a reminder as your training date approaches. If you are unable to attend, please contact me at the number below so we can reschedule your training."&BR()&BR()&"Once you have attended this training session, I will personally assist you in furthering your understanding of the system with detailed training regarding:"&BR()&BR()& "• Employee Access"&BR()& "• Security"&BR()& "• Hiring an Employee"&BR()& "• Documents and Help Menu"&BR()& "• Training Library"&BR()&BR()&
"As we go forward, I will also serve as your dedicated Paychex HR Online Advisor. Within this letter, I have included a list of frequently asked questions that are typical of new HR Online clients. Also for your convenience, I have attached an “HR Online Experience” Workbook that can be used as your ongoing reference guide."&BR()&BR()&
"Please call me should you need assistance."
